title: Japan’s Shinzo Abe, Former Prime Minister, Is Assassinated
sub_head: Police arrest 41-year-old man suspected of firing two shots at former leader with crudely made gun
body:
TOKYO—Shinzo Abe, a former Japanese prime minister, died after being shot Friday during an election campaign rally, sending shock waves through a country unaccustomed to gun violence.
Police arrested a 41-year-old man who they said approached Mr. Abe from behind as he gave a speech in the city of Nara and fired twice with what appeared to be an improvised firearm. A doctor who treated Mr. Abe said that he had gunshot wounds near the base of his neck and that one bullet pierced his heart.
